languages.text: "Он правильно сделал, что высунулся — вне своего проклятого города, с меньшими силами и на чужой территории он практически дал себя прикончить. Почаще бы нелюди так поддавались".
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Marazhai's second quest (to help him against Nazrakhei).
Marazhai: "Nazrakhei had no reason to leave the Webway. But he must not have had a choice if Vect's wrath was truly blazing at his back."

traits.locale_text: "Он правильно сделал, что высунулся — вне своего проклятого города, с меньшими силами и на чужой территории он практически дал себя прикончить. Почаще бы нелюди так поддавались".

languages.text: "It was nice of him to leave — outside his accursed city, with fewer forces at his side, and in unfamiliar territory, he practically ensured his own death. I wish xenos would do that more often."
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Marazhai's second quest (to help him against Nazrakhei).
Marazhai: "Nazrakhei had no reason to leave the Webway. But he must not have had a choice if Vect's wrath was truly blazing at his back."
languages.original_text: "Он правильно сделал, что высунулся — вне своего проклятого города, с меньшими силами и на чужой территории он практически дал себя прикончить. Почаще бы нелюди так поддавались".

traits.locale_text: "It was nice of him to leave — outside his accursed city, with fewer forces at his side, and in unfamiliar territory, he practically ensured his own death. I wish xenos would do that more often."
"It was nice of him to leave — outside his accursed city, with fewer forces at his side, and in unfamiliar territory, he practically ensured his own death. I wish xenos would do that more often."

"It was nice of him to leave — outside his accursed city, with fewer forces at his side, and in unfamiliar territory, he practically ensured his own death. I wish xenos would do that more often."
"It was nice of him to leave — outside his accursed city, with fewer forces at his side, and in unfamiliar territory, he practically ensured his own death. I wish xenos would do that more often."

languages.text: 「奴が出て行ってくれて助かった。呪われたあの都市の外に、味方もほとんど連れず、不慣れな土地へと向かったのだから、自ら死を招いたようなものだ。異種族どもがもっとこうしてくれればいいんだがな」
languages.original_text: "It was nice of him to leave — outside his accursed city, with fewer forces at his side, and in unfamiliar territory, he practically ensured his own death. I wish xenos would do that more often."

traits.locale_text: 「奴が出て行ってくれて助かった。呪われたあの都市の外に、味方もほとんど連れず、不慣れな土地へと向かったのだから、自ら死を招いたようなものだ。異種族どもがもっとこうしてくれればいいんだがな」

languages.text: "Es war nett von ihm, zu gehen. Außerhalb seiner verfluchten Stadt, mit weniger Truppen an seiner Seite und in unbekanntem Territorium ... Er hat seinen Tod selbst besiegelt. Das sollten Xenos häufiger tun."
languages.original_text: "It was nice of him to leave — outside his accursed city, with fewer forces at his side, and in unfamiliar territory, he practically ensured his own death. I wish xenos would do that more often."

traits.locale_text: "Es war nett von ihm, zu gehen. Außerhalb seiner verfluchten Stadt, mit weniger Truppen an seiner Seite und in unbekanntem Territorium ... Er hat seinen Tod selbst besiegelt. Das sollten Xenos häufiger tun."

languages.text: « C'était bien aimable à lui de partir. Hors de sa ville maudite, entouré d'un nombre réduit de troupes sur un territoire qu'il ne connaît pas, il a quasiment signé son arrêt de mort. J'aimerais que les xénos prennent ce genre d'initiative plus souvent. »
languages.original_text: "It was nice of him to leave — outside his accursed city, with fewer forces at his side, and in unfamiliar territory, he practically ensured his own death. I wish xenos would do that more often."

traits.locale_text: « C'était bien aimable à lui de partir. Hors de sa ville maudite, entouré d'un nombre réduit de troupes sur un territoire qu'il ne connaît pas, il a quasiment signé son arrêt de mort. J'aimerais que les xénos prennent ce genre d'initiative plus souvent. »

languages.text: «Marcharse fue un detalle por su parte; fuera de esta ciudad maldita, con menos fuerzas a su disposición y en territorio desconocido, prácticamente ha firmado su sentencia de muerte. Ojalá los xenos hicieran eso más a menudo».
languages.original_text: "It was nice of him to leave — outside his accursed city, with fewer forces at his side, and in unfamiliar territory, he practically ensured his own death. I wish xenos would do that more often."

traits.locale_text: «Marcharse fue un detalle por su parte; fuera de esta ciudad maldita, con menos fuerzas a su disposición y en territorio desconocido, prácticamente ha firmado su sentencia de muerte. Ojalá los xenos hicieran eso más a menudo».

languages.text: “他离开了那座受到诅咒的城市，来到了陌生的土地上，身边的兵力也更少了。这么做等同于自取灭亡，我真希望异形能多做些自寻死路的事情。”
languages.original_text: "It was nice of him to leave — outside his accursed city, with fewer forces at his side, and in unfamiliar territory, he practically ensured his own death. I wish xenos would do that more often."

traits.locale_text: “他离开了那座受到诅咒的城市，来到了陌生的土地上，身边的兵力也更少了。这么做等同于自取灭亡，我真希望异形能多做些自寻死路的事情。”

languages.text: "İyi ki ayrıldı. Lanet olası şehrinden uzakta, yaban ellerde takviye güç olmadan ölüm fermanını imzalamış oldu. Diğer zenolara örnek olur umarım."
languages.original_text: "It was nice of him to leave — outside his accursed city, with fewer forces at his side, and in unfamiliar territory, he practically ensured his own death. I wish xenos would do that more often."
